abstract: McNeil Consumer Healthcare, a Johnson & Johnson unit, laid out the actions it would take after the Food and Drug Administration criticized its quality control program.
snippet: McNeil Consumer Healthcare, a Johnson & Johnson unit, laid out the actions it would take after the Food and Drug Administration criticized its quality control program.
lead_paragraph: The Johnson & Johnson unit that drew criticism and a federal warning letter in January on the grounds of mishandling quality control problems with Tylenol says it has taken steps to prevent similar incidents in the future, according to documents newly posted on the Web site of the Food and Drug Administration.

headline.main: Maker of Tylenol Explains Actions Taken to Alleviate Musty Smell of Pills
headline.print_headline: Maker of Tylenol Explains Actions Taken to Alleviate Musty Smell of Pills
